long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of your data with Spooky AI. This privacy-focused tool empowers you to collect and utilize your own personal data to create personal assistants.

Key Features:

- Privacy First: Your data security is our top priority. We store your information in an Azure storage bucket with Azure-level security, ensuring the utmost privacy and protection.

- Automated Data Collection: After just 10 seconds on a website, our extension automatically indexes the webpage, making it easy for you to capture and organize the data that matters to you.

- Webpage Screenshots: Our extension also automatically takes snapshots of web pages and sends it to GPT-4 Vision to add context to your data.

- Train Your Personal Assistant: Use the collected data to train your very own personalized virtual assistant. Tailor it to your needs, preferences, and tasks.

Benefits:

- Privacy Empowerment: Safeguard your data and decide how it's used, all while benefiting from the insights it provides.

- Effortless Data Collection: Automatically index websites and gather data effortlessly, no technical skills required.

- AI Personalization: Create personal assistants that understand you better than anyone else, streamlining your online tasks and enhancing productivity.
